channel.title: Roman Age
channel.description:
WELCOME TO ROMAN AGE!
[URL=http://"http://romanage.co.nr/"]JOIN NOW![/URL]
ROMAN AGE IS AN OLD SCHOOL PK RSPS. THERE IS NO SPAWN! WE HAVE EASY MONEY MAKING AND LOTS OF BOSSING! SKILLING IS ALMOST PERFECT AS WELL. IT WAS BUILT ON A SOULSPLIT SOURCE SO THE COMBAT IS AMAZING. SWITCHING HAS NEVER BEEN BETTER! ENJOY OUR MINIGAMES, PK, MULTI-BOSSING, CLANS, TREASURE TRIALS, CITY PKING (VARROCK, ARDOUGNE) / WILD PKING.
FAST CONTENT CONTENT - CITY PK IN VARROCK, ARDOUGNE - WILD PKING WITH PK DROPS - PENGUINS (NOT OP DROPS) - GREAT SHOPS TO GET READY FOR PK - PURE COMMAND TO START PKING RIGHT AWAY -XP LOCK - DROP RATES FAIRLY LOW TO START ECONOMY - GREAT COMBAT XP RATES TO START PKING RIGHT AWAY - ALL OLD SKILLS TRAINABLE (NO DUNG/ SUMMONING) - DICING - ALL DUPES FOUND WERE PATCHED, ANY NEW ONES WILL BE FIXED ASAP - GREAT WEBSITE - GMAUL WORKS - RING OF STONE/ RING OF WEALTH/ ZERKER NECKLACE ALL WORKING! - DOUBLE XP FOR SKILLS ON WEEKENDS - PK TOURNAMENTS AND RANDOM FUN EVENTS!
[URL=http://"http://romanage.co.nr//"]JOIN NOW![/URL]
MEDIA [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/2zpusdi/5]website[/URL] [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/2jflu11/5]telegrab[/URL] [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/30sbwcz/5]starter[/URL] [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/nmawzb/5]pure[/URL] [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/14jspqd/5]penguins[/URL] [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/2lo5h90/5]load screen[/URL] [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/2myyczt/5]facebook[/URL] [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/2u73aqb/5]dbow[/URL]

OR GO TO http://romanage.co.nr/
